name: Furby
longInfo: Some say furbies are actually aliens posing as mechanical toys lurking around humans.

name: Nokia 3310
longInfo: Can you still navigate its operation system?

name: Hoop Rolling
shortInfo: Simple joy to run with hoop.
longInfo: Actually a very good sort of cardio fitness.

name: Beyblade Burst
longInfo: Children still play them nowdays btw.

name: CD Player
longInfo: How many CD albums do you have in your storage room? They sound better than streaming service!

name: Clockwork Frog
shortInfo: Jump high! And does not cost electricity.
longInfo: Actually there were more animal models of this type of toy but whatever FROG is the most classic one.

name: Fishing Toy
shortInfo: Although you are fising plastic fishes.
longInfo: Although you are fising plastic fishes, the fun is the same... almost the same...

name: Game Boy
shortInfo: Who was so lucky to have these game consoles??
longInfo: Nintendo's legendary creations were always much fun.

name: Magnetic Drawing Board
longInfo: You can play with a stationary like this instead of using it to study if you want.

name: Mini 4WD
shortInfo: It is always with the manga.
longInfo: The manga actually lies because your 4WD could not suddenly fly up when you orally command it.

name: Tamagotchi
shortInfo: Maybe one of the very early ideas about Metaverse.
longInfo: So pretty little thingy to hang on your jeans and add some flavour to your outfit! And if I remember the little digital creature can even poo...

name: Walkman
shortInfo: Most classic design! And it ate tapes.
longInfo: Because the tape has been gone, the walkman faces extinction due to lack of food
